name: William Taylor REIL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION and its Bureau of Driver Licensing Leslie Richards, Secretary, Kara N. Templeton, Director of BDL, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Reil v. Pennsylvania Department of Transportation

judges: Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: William Taylor REIL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION and its Bureau of Driver Licensing Leslie Richards, Secretary, Kara N. Templeton, Director of BDL, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of February, 2016, Appellant’s Notice and Demand for Oral Argument is DENIED, and the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
132 A.3d 455
William Taylor REIL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION and its Bureau of Driver Licensing Leslie Richards, Secretary, Kara N. Templeton, Director of BDL, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 16, 2016.
